com.viaoa.hub
Class HubSortListener

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
      com.viaoa.hub.HubSortListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
HubListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class HubSortListener
extends HubListenerAdapter
implements java.io.Serializable

HubSortListener is used to keep a Hub sorted by the Hubs sort/select order. Used internally by Hub.sort method. Note: For oa.cs, each client will maintain their own sorting. If a sort property is changed, then each client will resort, without any messages going to/from server.

For more information about this package, see documentation.

See Also:
Hub.sort, that is created based on propertyPaths, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

HubSortListener

public HubSortListener(Hub hub,
                       java.lang.String propertyPaths,
                       boolean bAscending)
Used by Hub for sorting objects.

Parameters:
propertyPaths - list of property paths ( comma or space delimited). Can include "asc" or "desc" after a propertyPath name. All property paths will be listened to, so that changes to them will updated the sorted Hub.
See Also:
OAComparator.OAComparator(java.lang.Class, java.lang.String, boolean), instead of using this object directly.
